name: Alien Cat 7
description:
All cats are crazy about boxes! Except for this game, because boxes fall down your head! To avoid it,
one will have to wind his brain up and and demonstrate his skills.

Alien Cat 7 is a 2D platformer with a side view.The game task is to reach the Portal gate while dodging the blocks falling down,
cause the blocks may hit the restless kitty.The task isn't as simple as it seems.The character will have to get through the hills.
To pass the hills, he will have to build a path made of boxes.

Features:


  • 30 intriguing levels
  • pixel graphics
  • adequate background audio.
